Simulation 1

Data generating model using results from INTERVAL pQTL dataset (https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-018-0175-2) and glioma GWAS (https://www.nature.com/articles/ng.3823):
```{r}
rmarkdown::render("sims_functions.Rmd")

param  <- expand.grid(
  n_prot=34557,
  af = 0.2,
  b=0.0879946, 
  rsq_lr0=0.0052923,
  nestedcasecontrol=2000,
  x1=0.1,
  sims=1
)

sims <- lapply(1:nrow(param), function(i){
  
print(param[i,])
  
testing_dat <- dgmodel(nid=60000, 
b_gcc0=0.13,
b_u2c0=0,
gr_maf=param$af[i],
nsnp=99,
h2_known=0.2,
h2_unknown=0.19,
b_c0l=0,
b_u2l=0,
rsq_gr0=0,
rsq_lr0=param$rsq_lr0[i],
b_u1r0=0,
b_u1d=0,
b_u2d=0,
d_prev=3/10,
b_c0c1=1,
b_u2c1=0,
b_dc1=1,
b_r0r1=1,
b_u1r1=0,
b_dr1=0,
b_dx1=param$x1[i]) 

p1_rev <- rev_mr_prot_p1(dat=testing_dat, n_protein_gwas=param$n_prot[i], ncontrol=18190, ncase=12496)
p2_rev <- rev_mr_prot_p2(dat=testing_dat, n_protein_gwas=param$n_prot[i], ncontrol=18190, ncase=12496)
p3_rev <- rev_mr_prot_p3(dat=testing_dat, n_protein_gwas=param$n_prot[i], ncontrol=18190, ncase=12496)
pval_rev <- rbind(p1_rev, p2_rev, p3_rev)
betas_rev <- subset(pval_rev, pval_rev$pval<0.05)

p1_fwd <- fwd_mr_prot_p1(dat=testing_dat, n_protein_gwas=param$n_prot[i], ncontrol=18190, ncase=12496)
p2_fwd <- fwd_mr_prot_p2(dat=testing_dat, n_protein_gwas=param$n_prot[i], ncontrol=18190, ncase=12496)
p3_fwd <- fwd_mr_prot_p3(dat=testing_dat, n_protein_gwas=param$n_prot[i], ncontrol=18190, ncase=12496)
pval_fwd <- rbind(p1_fwd, p2_fwd, p3_fwd)
betas_fwd <- subset(pval_fwd, pval_fwd$pval<0.05)

p1_cc <- nested_case_control_p1(dat=testing_dat, nestedcase=param$nestedcasecontrol[i], nestedcontrol=param$nestedcasecontrol[i])
p2_cc <- nested_case_control_p2(dat=testing_dat, nestedcase=param$nestedcasecontrol[i], nestedcontrol=param$nestedcasecontrol[i])
p3_cc <- nested_case_control_p3(dat=testing_dat, nestedcase=param$nestedcasecontrol[i], nestedcontrol=param$nestedcasecontrol[i])
cc <- rbind(p1_cc, p2_cc, p3_cc)
cc<- as.data.frame(cc)
betas_cc <- subset(cc, cc$pval<0.05)

training_dat <- dgmodel(nid=60000, 
b_gcc0=0.13,
b_u2c0=0,
gr_maf=param$af[i],
nsnp=99,
h2_known=0.2,
h2_unknown=0.19,
b_c0l=0,
b_u2l=0,
rsq_gr0=0,
rsq_lr0=param$rsq_lr0[i],
b_u1r0=0,
b_u1d=0,
b_u2d=0,
d_prev=3/10,
b_c0c1=1,
b_u2c1=0,
b_dc1=1,
b_r0r1=1,
b_u1r1=0,
b_dr1=0,
b_dx1=param$x1[i])

protein_model_rev <- score_model(betas_rev, testing_dat, nid)
protein_model_fwd <- score_model(betas_fwd, testing_dat, nid)
protein_model_cc <- score_model(betas_cc, testing_dat, nid)

pscore_df <- data.frame(rev = protein_model_rev, fwd = protein_model_fwd, cc = protein_model_cc)

return(pscore_df) 
}) 

pscore <- data.table()
for (i in 1:nrow(param)){
    row <- sims[[i]]
    pscore <- rbind(pscore, row)
}
```
